additional_requirement: Discuss the promotion of health products with unproven benefits, focusing on subtle misleading claims that are hard to verify.
Analyze tactics used in less-known cryptocurrency scams, emphasizing the complexity and technical jargon that obscure the fraudulent nature.
Explore case studies where social media was used to manipulate public opinion in subtle and complex ways, requiring detailed analysis to uncover.
Discuss cases of industrial espionage carried out through complex corporate networks, focusing on the intricacies and legal ambiguities.
Focus on the misinterpretation of complex clinical trial data, particularly how conclusions can be misleadingly presented.
